channel.title: Welcome to my blog! on Yehor Kozyr Blog

item.title: Qiskit PhaseOracle Construction With Constants in Logical Expressions
item.description: In this post I cover how to use a constant boolean value in a logical expression for Qiskit PhaseOracle.

item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I write about software engineering – my personal projects, projects I find interesting, explanations of some LeetCode problems, concepts and topics that don’t have enough explanation online. Feel free to check out my pages in other locations of the Internet: LinkedIn: Yehor Kozyr GitHub: Sne4kers LeetCode: Sne4kers Instagram: @ykozyr I am looking for a job. Get my CV here. Contact: yehor@kozyr.xyz

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my first post in the blog. What do people write in these?
